title: Problems in queue and champ select
body: So today I've been having issues where during queue when I clicked accept for some reason it didn't register I accepted, or in champ select, either I lagged out really hard, or for some reason I was unable to choose a champion and thus got the 15 minute delay because I was booted out of queue.

replies.body: It sounds like your losing sync and getting left behind in champion select, which can happen with a poor connection.  Leaving during this time, even if unintentional, will result in a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging).  Check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get that fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
